document_data.mainbody:
The H series was a series of four Forgotten Realms 1-edition adventures published by TSR, Inc. between 1985 and 1988. The series focused on the Bloodstone Pass and area. The series used traditional role-playing combined with the Battlesystem rules.
CategoryBooks
CategoryBloodstone Pass series
